name: Seekarkreuz
description: Hike from Lenggries to Seekarkreuz (1601 m).

name: Wendelstein
description: Hike from Osterhofen to Bayrischzell via Wendelstein (1838 m).

name: Bad Tölz - Lenggries
description: Hike from Bad Tölz to Lenggries via Isar.

name: Furnas
description: Hike from Furnas and back via Parque da Grená.

name: Seebergkopf
description: Hike from Osterhofen to Bayrischzell via Seebergkopf (1538 m).

name: Tegernsee Panoramaweg
description: Hike from Tegernsee to Gmund (am Tegernsee) via Bad Wiessee.

name: Gindelalmschneid
description: Hike from Schliersee to Tegernsee via Gindelalmschneid (1335 m).

name: Laimbachfall
description: Hike from Kochel am See to Lainbach Wasserfall and back to lake Kochel. Photo by Helga.

name: Herzogstand
description: Hike from Walchensee to Kochel via Herzogstand (1731 m).

name: Nebelhorn
description: Hike from Oberstdorf and back via Nebelhorn (2224 m).

name: Jenner
description: Hike from Königssee and back via Jenner (1874 m).

name: Bayrischzell Hohenweg
description: Hike from Bayrischzell and back along the Hohenweg.

name: Starnberg - Tutzing
description: Hike from Starnberg to Tutzing along Starnberger See.

name: Feldafing - Tutzing
description: Hike from Feldafing to Tutzing along the hillside.

name: Starnberg - Munsing
description: Hike from Starnberg to Munsing along Starnberger See.

name: Kegon falls
description: Hike from Okunikko Yumoto Onsen source (奥日光湯元温泉源泉) to the Kegon Waterfall (華厳滝) via Lake Chūzenji (中禅寺湖).

name: Kloster Andechs
description: Hike from Herrsching to Kloster Andechs.

name: Takao
description: Hike from Takaosanguchi Station (高尾山口駅) and back via Takao (高尾山) (599 m).

name: Nokogiri
description: Hike from Nokogiriyama Ropeway Mountain peak station (鋸山山頂駅) to Hota Station (保田駅) via the seaside.

name: Oyama
description: Hike from Ryoben falls (良弁滝) and back via Oyama (大山).

name: Miura
description: Hike from Misakiguchi Station (三崎口駅) to Jogashima Lighthouse (城ヶ島灯台) via the Miura (三浦市) seaside.

name: Fujisan
description: Hike from Fujisan 5th Station (富士山五合目) to the public toilet near the toll gate (料金所下公衆トイレ), because the road was closed for the night, via Fujisan (富士山) (3776 m) 8.5th Station Goraikokan (御来光館) (3450 m).

name: Josefsthaler Wasserfälle
description: Hike from Schliersee to Neuhaus via the Josefstaler Wasserfall.

name: Tegernsee Rottachfall
description: Hike from Tegernsee and back via Rottach Wasserfall.

name: Himmelschrofen
description: Hike from Oberstdorf and back via Himmelschrofen (1790 m).

name: Wank
description: Hike from Garmisch and back via Wank (1780 m).

name: Kramerspitz
description: Hike from Garmisch and back via Kramerspitz (1985 m).

name: Eibsee
description: Hike around Eibsee.

name: Sonnenspitz & Jochberg
description: Hike from Kochel am See and back via Sonnenspitz (1269 m) and Jochberg (1565 m). Shorter route was closed.

name: Riefenkopf & Hahnenköpfle
description: Hike from Oberstdorf and back via Riefenkopf (1749 m) and Hahnenköpfle (1735 m).

name: Neuschwanstein & Tegelberg
description: Hike from Neuschwanstein to Füssen via Tegelberg (1700 m).

name: Partnachklamm
description: Hike from Garmisch and back via Partnachklamm.

name: Miyagase Dam
description: Hike from Aikawa Bridge (愛川大橋) and back via the Miyagase Dam (宮ヶ瀬ダム).

name: Murnau
description: Hike from Murnau am Staffelsee and back via the Münter-Haus museum.

name: Lisboa Monsanto
description: Hike from downtown Lisbon to Belem via Panorâmico de Monsanto.

name: Vorderskopf
description: Hike from Rißtal Landstraße bus stop Aufstieg Tölzer Hütte and back to stop Kaiserhütte via Vorderskopf (1858 m).

name: Aiplspitz
description: Hike from Neuhaus to Osterhofen via Aiplspitz (1759 m).

name: Älpelesattel
description: Hike from Bayrischzell and back via Älpelesattel (1772 m). An extended version of this.

name: Schrecksee
description: Hike from Auele stop near Bad Hindelang to Vilalpsee bus stop via Schrecksee, Kirchdachsattel (1925 m), and Hintere Schafwanne (1957 m). An extended version of this.

name: Branderschrofen
description: Hike from Tegelbergbahn near Schwangau to Neuschwanstein via Branderschrofen (1881 m). An extended version of this.

name: Klammspitz
description: Hike from Castle Linderhof and back via Klammspitz (1924 m). An extended version of this.

name: Kranzberg
description: Hike from Mittenwald and back via Kranzberg (1391 m). An extended version of this.

name: Rotwand
description: Hike from Mittenwald and back via Rotwand (1884 m). An extended version of this.

name: Schärtenspitze
description: Hike from Hintersee to Ramsau bei Berchtesgaden via Schärtenspitze (2153 m). An extended version of this.

name: Wimbachklamm
description: Hike from Wimbachbrücke and back via Wimbachklamm and Wimbachschloss (930 m). An extended version of this.

name: St. Bartholomä Eiskapelle
description: Hike from St. Bartholomä and back via the Eiskapelle. An extended version of this.

name: Röthbachfall
description: Hike from Salet and back via Halsköpfl (1718 m) and Röthbachfall. An extended version of this.

name: Altmühltal Panoramaweg
description: Hike from Treuchtlingen to Pappenheim via Altmühltal Panoramaweg. An extended version of this.

name: Murnau - Uffing
description: Hike from Murnau to Uffing via Staffelsee Panoramaweg. The other way around, starting at Uffing, is more beautiful.

name: Wallberg
description: Hike from Rottach-Egern and back via Wallberg (1722 m). An extended version of this.

name: Gmund - Neuhaus
description: Hike from Gmund to Neuhaus via Neureuth, Gindelalmschneid (1335 m), and Schilersee.

name: Kochel Walchenseekraftwerk
description: Hike from Walchenseekraftwerk down to the Kesselbach waterfalls and around Kochelsee.

name: Jochberg
description: Hike from Kesselberg to Urfeld via Jochberg (1565 m).

name: Blaubeuren
description: Hike from Blaubeuren to the Günzelburg ruins and back.

name: Freising - Garching
description: Hike from Freising to Garching along Isar.

name: Garching - München
description: Hike from Garching to München along Isar.

name: Fockenstein
description: Hike from Lenggries to Bad Wiessee am Tegernsee via Fockenstein (1564 m).

name: Wildbarren
description: Hike from Oberaudorf to Flintsbach am Inn via Wildbarren (1448 m).

name: Heimgarten
description: Hike from Walchensee to Ohlstadt via Heimgarten (1791 m).

name: Benediktenwand
description: Hike from Lenggries to Kochel am See via Stangeneck (1646 m), Vorderer Kirchstein (1670 m), Latschenkopf (1712 m), Achselköpfe (1709 m), and Benediktenwand (1800 m).
